text: Cangidani sumo, ej mu'minon ʙo musrikon dar mohe, ki Alloh cangidanro dar on harom kardaast, cazoest ʙarojason dar on moh, ja'ne, har cize ki mavridi ehtirom qaror girad az mohi harom, sahri harom va tamomi cizhoe, ki sari'at ʙa takrimi on amr kardaast, pas har kas ʙa in muqaddasot va muharramot ʙehurmati kunad, az u qasos girifta mesavad. Binoʙar in kase dar mohi harom ʙicangad, ʙo u cang xohad sud. Va az Alloh ʙitarsed va ʙidoned, ki U ʙo parhezgoron ast
